Header.forcings: N/A Nat Ant GHG SD SI SA TO SO Oz LU Sl Vl SS Ds BC MD OC AA

ocean_sigma_z.z_factors: sigma: sigma eta: eta depth: depth depth_c: depth_c nsigma: nsigma zlev: zlev
ocean_sigma_z.z_bounds_factors: sigma: sigma_bnds eta: eta depth: depth depth_c: depth_c nsigma: nsigma zlev: zlev_bnds
ocean_sigma_z.formula: for k <= nsigma: z(n,k,j,i) = eta(n,j,i) + sigma(k)*(min(depth_c,depth(j,i))+eta(n,j,i)) ; for k > nsigma: z(n,k,j,i) = zlev(k)

smooth_level.z_factors: a: a b1: b1 b2: b2 ztop: ztop zsurf1: zsurf1 zsurf2: zsurf2
smooth_level.z_bounds_factors: a: a_bnds b1: b1_bnds b2: b2_bnds ztop: ztop zsurf1: zsurf1 zsurf2: zsurf2

ocean_sigma.z_factors: sigma: lev eta: eta depth: depth
ocean_sigma.z_bounds_factors: sigma: lev_bnds eta: eta depth: depth

ocean_s.z_factors: s: lev eta: eta depth: depth a: a_coeff b: b_coeff depth_c: depth_c
ocean_s.z_bounds_factors: s: lev_bnds eta: eta depth: depth a: a b: b depth_c: depth_c
ocean_s.formula:
z(n,k,j,i) = eta(n,j,i)*(1+s(k)) + depth_c*s(k) + (depth(j,i)-depth_c)*C(k) 
 where 
 C(k)=(1-b)*sinh(a*s(k))/sinh(a) +
           b*(tanh(a*(s(k)+0.5))/(2*tanh(0.5*a)) - 0.5)

alternate_hybrid_sigma.z_factors: ap: ap b: b ps: ps
alternate_hybrid_sigma.z_bounds_factors: ap: ap_bnds b: b_bnds ps: ps

standard_sigma.z_factors: ptop: ptop sigma: lev ps: ps
standard_sigma.z_bounds_factors: ptop: ptop sigma: lev_bnds ps: ps

dbze.long_name: CloudSat simulator equivalent radar reflectivity factor

hybrid_height.z_factors: a: lev b: b orog: orog
hybrid_height.z_bounds_factors: a: lev_bnds b: b_bnds orog: orog

ocean_double_sigma.z_factors: sigma: sigma depth: depth z1: z1 z2: z2 a: a_coeff href: href k_c: k_c
ocean_double_sigma.z_bounds_factors: sigma: sigma_bnds depth: depth z1: z1 z2: z2 a: a href: href k_c: k_c

standard_hybrid_sigma.z_factors: p0: p0 a: a b: b ps: ps
standard_hybrid_sigma.z_bounds_factors: p0: p0 a: a_bnds b: b_bnds ps: ps

diftrbbo2d.cell_measures: time: mean within years time: mean over years

difmxylo2d.cell_measures: time: mean within years time: mean over years

diftrxybo.cell_measures: time: mean within years time: mean over years

tnpeot.long_name: Tendency of Ocean Potential Energy Content due to Tides
tnpeot.cell_measures: time: mean within years time: mean over years

difvtrto.long_name: Ocean Vertical Tracer Diffusivity due to Tides
difvtrto.cell_measures: time: mean within years time: mean over years

difvho.comment: Vertical/dianeutral diffusivity applied to prognostic temperature field.
difvho.cell_measures: time: mean within years time: mean over years

diftrblo2d.cell_measures: time: mean within years time: mean over years

tnkebto2d.long_name: Tendency of Ocean Eddy Kinetic Energy Content due to Bolus Transport
tnkebto2d.cell_measures: time: mean within years time: mean over years

difvtrbo.long_name: Ocean Vertical Tracer Diffusivity due to Background
difvtrbo.cell_measures: time: mean within years time: mean over years

tnpeo.comment: Rate that work is done against vertical stratification, as measured by the vertical heat and salt diffusivity. Report here as depth integrated two-dimensional field.
tnpeo.long_name: tendency of ocean potential energy content
tnpeo.cell_measures: time: mean within years time: mean over years

tnkebto.comment: Depth integrated impacts on kinetic energy arising from parameterized eddy-induced advection. For CMIP5, this diagnostic was 3d, whereas the CMIP6 depth integrated diagnostic is sufficient for many purposes and reduces archive requirements.
tnkebto.long_name: tendency of ocean eddy kinetic energy content due to parameterized eddy advection
tnkebto.cell_measures: time: mean within years time: mean over years

diftrxybo2d.cell_measures: time: mean within years time: mean over years

difvmbo.long_name: Ocean Vertical Momentum Diffusivity due to Background
difvmbo.cell_measures: time: mean within years time: mean over years

dispkexyfo2d.long_name: Ocean Kinetic Energy Dissipation Per Unit Area due to XY Friction
dispkexyfo2d.cell_measures: time: mean within years time: mean over years

diftrxylo2d.cell_measures: time: mean within years time: mean over years

diftrbbo.cell_measures: time: mean within years time: mean over years

diftrelo2d.cell_measures: time: mean within years time: mean over years

difvmfdo.long_name: Ocean Vertical Momentum Diffusivity due to Form Drag
difvmfdo.cell_measures: time: mean within years time: mean over years

diftrebo2d.cell_measures: time: mean within years time: mean over years

difmxybo.comment: Lateral biharmonic viscosity applied to the momentum equitions.
difmxybo.cell_measures: time: mean within years time: mean over years

diftrblo.comment: Ocean tracer diffusivity associated with parameterized eddy-induced advective transport. Sometimes this diffusivity is called the 'thickness' diffusivity. For CMIP5, this diagnostic was called 'ocean tracer bolus laplacian diffusivity'.  The CMIP6 name is physically more relevant.
diftrblo.long_name: ocean tracer diffusivity due to parameterized mesoscale advection
diftrblo.cell_measures: time: mean within years time: mean over years

difvso.comment: Vertical/dianeutral diffusivity applied to prognostic salinity field.
difvso.cell_measures: time: mean within years time: mean over years

difvmto.long_name: Ocean Vertical Momentum Diffusivity due to Tides
difvmto.cell_measures: time: mean within years time: mean over years

difmxybo2d.cell_measures: time: mean within years time: mean over years

difmxylo.comment: Lateral Laplacian viscosity applied to the momentum equitions.
difmxylo.cell_measures: time: mean within years time: mean over years

a.long_name: vertical coordinate formula term: coefficient a

p0.long_name: vertical coordinate formula term: reference pressure

b.long_name: vertical coordinate formula term: coefficient b

dispkevfo.long_name: Ocean Kinetic Energy Dissipation Per Unit Area due to Vertical Friction
dispkevfo.cell_measures: time: mean within years time: mean over years

zfull.long_name: Depth Below Geoid of Ocean Layer
zfull.cell_measures: time: mean within years time: mean over years

zhalf.long_name: Depth Below Geoid of Interfaces Between Ocean Layers
zhalf.cell_measures: time: mean within years time: mean over years

dispkexyfo.comment: Depth integrated impacts on kinetic energy arising from lateral frictional dissipation associated with Laplacian and/or biharmonic viscosity. For CMIP5, this diagnostic was 3d, whereas the CMIP6 depth integrated diagnostic is sufficient for many purposes and reduces archive requirements.
dispkexyfo.long_name: ocean kinetic energy dissipation per unit area due to xy friction
dispkexyfo.cell_measures: time: mean within years time: mean over years

diftrelo.comment: Ocean tracer diffusivity associated with parameterized eddy-induced diffusive transport oriented along neutral or isopycnal directions. Sometimes this diffusivity is called the neutral diffusivity or isopycnal diffusivity or Redi diffusivity.
diftrelo.cell_measures: time: mean within years time: mean over years

diftrxylo.cell_measures: time: mean within years time: mean over years

depth.long_name: Sea Floor Depth: formula term: thetao

eta.long_name: Sea Surface Height formula term: thetao

difvmo.cell_measures: time: mean within years time: mean over years

diftrebo.cell_measures: time: mean within years time: mean over years

tnpeotb.long_name: Tendency of Ocean Potential Energy Content due to Background
tnpeotb.cell_measures: time: mean within years time: mean over years
